import React from "react"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import Loz from "../components/LoadingBox"; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductScreen(props){ const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; if (!product) { return
Le produit n'a pas été trouvé
} return (
{loading ? : error ? {error} :(
Retour

  • {product.name}

  • Price: {product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0?En stock: Rupture de stock}
)}
) }
